metadata.title: CVE-2024-11702 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Copying sensitive information from Private Browsing tabs on Android, suchas passwords, may have inadvertently stored data in the cloud-basedclipboard history if enabled. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 133 andThunderbird < 133.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
